findings.message: Validation commands used `pnpm --filter xa-uploader ...` but package name is `@apps/xa-uploader`. Fixed.
Same filter-selector issue in TASK-03 refactor step. Fixed.
TASK-03 refactor step ran lint only; added typecheck. Fixed.

review: Score 9/10. 2 Major findings: pnpm filter selector wrong (xa-uploader vs @apps/xa-uploader) — fixed. 1 Minor: TASK-03 missing typecheck in refactor — fixed. Final round. Plan credible (≥4.0), no Critical findings.
